00029 class simbio_dbop extends simbio
00030 {
00031     private $obj_db = false;
00032     private $sql_string = '';
00033     public $insert_id = 0;
00034     public $affected_rows = 0;
00035 
00042     public function __construct($obj_db)
00043     {
00044         $this->obj_db = $obj_db;
00045     }
00046 
00047 
00055     public function insert($str_table, $array_data)
00056     {
00057         if (!is_array($array_data) OR count($array_data) == 0) {
00058             return false;
00059         }
00060 
00061         // parse the array first
00062         $_str_columns = '';
00063         $_str_value = '';
00064         foreach ($array_data as $column => $value) {
00065             // concatenating column name
00066             $_str_columns .= ", $column";
00067             // concatenating value
00068             if ($value === 'NULL' OR $value === null) {
00069                 // if the value is NULL or string NULL
00070                 $_str_value .= ', NULL';
00071             } else if (is_string($value)) {
00072                 if (preg_match("/^literal{.+}/i", $value)) {
00073                     $value = preg_replace("/literal{|}/i", '', $value);
00074                     $_str_value .= ", $value";
00075                 } else {
00076                     // concatenating column value
00077                     $_str_value .= ", '$value'";
00078                 }
00079             } else {
00080                 // if the value is an integer or unknown data type
00081                 $_str_value .= ", $value";
00082             }
00083         }
00084 
00085         // strip the first comma  of string
00086         $_str_columns = substr_replace($_str_columns, '', 0, 1);
00087         $_str_value = substr_replace($_str_value, '', 0, 1);
00088 
00089         // the insert query
00090         $this->sql_string = "INSERT INTO $str_table ($_str_columns) "
00091             ."VALUES ($_str_value)";
00092         $_insert = $this->obj_db->query($this->sql_string);
00093         // if an error occur
00094         if ($this->obj_db->error) { $this->error = $this->obj_db->error; return false; }
00095         // get last inserted record ID
00096         $this->insert_id = $this->obj_db->insert_id;
00097         $this->affected_rows = $this->obj_db->affected_rows;
00098 
00099         return true;
00100     }
00101 
00102 
00111     public function update($str_table, $array_update, $str_criteria)
00112     {
00113         // check if the first argumen is an array
00114         if (!is_array($array_update)) {
00115             return false;
00116         } else {
00117             $_set = '';
00118             // concat the update query string
00119             foreach ($array_update as $column => $new_value) {
00120                 if ($new_value == '') {
00121                     $_set .= ", $column = ''";
00122                 } else if ($new_value === 'NULL' OR $new_value == null) {
00123                     $_set .= ", $column = NULL";
00124                 } else if (is_string($new_value)) {
00125                     if (preg_match("/^literal{.+}/i", $new_value)) {
00126                         $new_value = preg_replace("/literal{|}/i", '', $new_value);
00127                         $_set .= ", $column = $new_value";
00128                     } else {
00129                         $_set .= ", $column = '$new_value'";
00130                     }
00131                 } else {
00132                     $_set .= ", $column = $new_value";
00133                 }
00134             }
00135 
00136             // strip the first comma
00137             $_set = substr_replace($_set, '', 0, 1);
00138         }
00139 
00140         // update query
00141         $_update = $this->obj_db->query("UPDATE $str_table SET $_set WHERE $str_criteria");
00142         // if an error occur
00143         if ($this->obj_db->error) { $this->error = $this->obj_db->error; return false; }
00144         // number of affected rows
00145         $this->affected_rows = $this->obj_db->affected_rows;
00146 
00147         return true;
00148     }
00149 
00150 
00158     public function delete($str_table, $str_criteria)
00159     {
00160         // the delete query
00161         $_delete = $this->obj_db->query("DELETE FROM $str_table WHERE $str_criteria");
00162         // if an error occur
00163         if ($this->obj_db->error) { $this->error = $this->obj_db->error; return false; }
00164         // affected rows
00165         $this->affected_rows = $this->obj_db->affected_rows;
00166 
00167         return true;
00168     }
00169 
00170 }
